FuncDef: This command specifies the system IP address of the egress router for the static LSP. When creating an LSP this command is required. For LSPs that are used as transport tunnels for services, thetoIP addressmustbe the system IP address. If thetoaddress does not match the SDP address, the LSP is not included in the SDP definition.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the system IP address of the egress router.
